title: Save up to $90 when you Buy the OnePlus Watch 2!
description: Grab it for a much lower price right now. The post Save up to $90 when you Buy the OnePlus Watch 2! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Grab it for a much lower price right now.
text: OnePlus’ return to the smart wearable arena was a triumphant one to say the least – the OnePlus Watch 2 improves on its predecessor in every single way, and packs a lot of much-welcome upgrades, making for one very premium smartwatch. It’s on sale right now, making it a bit more affordable than its usual retail price. In terms of specs, the OnePlus Watch 2 comes with a 1.43-inch AMOLED touch screen, IP68 dust and water protection, a powerful Snapdragon W5 chip, 2GB of RAM and 32GB of internal storage for apps, as well as an attractive-looking stainless steel design in addition to a sapphire glass display, which should keep it safe from most scuffs and scratches. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
